title: Corporate Governance Practices of HarborOne Bancorp Inc

content.text: HarborOne Bancorp Inc has a diverse and experienced board of directors. The board consists of nine members, six of whom are independent directors. This composition ensures that the board operates independently and makes impartial decisions. The board members have expertise in various areas such as finance, banking, risk management, and legal, contributing to well-rounded decision-making.

HarborOne Bancorp Inc follows a performance-based compensation structure for its executives. The compensation committee is responsible for setting executive salaries, bonuses, and other incentives. The committee considers both financial performance and individual contributions to determine compensation. This approach aligns the interests of executives with the long-term success of the company and motivates them to drive shareholder value.

HarborOne Bancorp Inc has established a robust risk management framework. The board oversees the company's risk management practices and regularly assesses and monitors risks. The board actively participates in identifying, evaluating, and mitigating risks to ensure the safety and soundness of the organization. This proactive approach enables HarborOne Bancorp Inc to effectively manage risks and protect the interests of its stakeholders.

HarborOne Bancorp Inc places a strong emphasis on ethical behavior and integrity. The company has a code of conduct in place that guides the actions of its directors, officers, and employees. The board regularly reviews and updates the code of conduct to ensure it reflects changing industry standards and best practices. This commitment to ethical standards fosters trust among stakeholders and contributes to the company's reputation.

HarborOne Bancorp Inc actively engages with its shareholders to understand their perspectives and concerns. The company holds regular shareholder meetings where shareholders can voice their opinions and ask questions to the board and management. The board encourages open and transparent communication with shareholders and seeks to address their concerns effectively. This shareholder engagement helps in building long-term relationships and ensuring alignment of interests.

HarborOne Bancorp Inc places great importance on transparency and timely disclosure of information. The company provides detailed financial and non-financial disclosures in its annual reports, quarterly reports, and other SEC filings. The board ensures that all material information is accurately and promptly disclosed to shareholders and the public. This transparency promotes trust and allows stakeholders to make informed decisions.

HarborOne Bancorp Inc has established various board committees to enhance corporate governance. These committees, including the audit committee, compensation committee, and risk management committee, have clear charters outlining their responsibilities. The committees meet regularly and provide independent oversight in their respective areas of expertise. This committee structure strengthens accountability and decision-making within the organization.

HarborOne Bancorp Inc demonstrates strong corporate governance practices through its diverse board composition, performance-based executive compensation, robust risk management framework, emphasis on ethical standards, active shareholder engagement, transparency in disclosures, and effective board committees. These practices contribute to the company's overall governance effectiveness and position it well for sustainable growth and long-term success.
